   contain the root `toctree` directive.

EconoBlob Documentation
=======================

Welcome to the EconoBlob documentation! This project simulates a society with its own economy, allowing for an in-depth exploration of economic principles in a virtual environment.

Getting Started
===============

To get started with EconoBlob, follow these steps:

1. **Clone the repository**:

   First, clone the repository to your local machine using Git:

   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/econoblob.git
   ```

Key Features
============
